pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ipython-autotimeTime everything in IPython## Installation:```console$ pip install ipython-autotime```## Examples```pythonIn [1]: %load_ext autotimetime: 264 µs (started: 2020-12-15 11:44:36 +01:00)In [2]: x = 1time: 416 µs (started: 2020-12-15 11:44:45 +01:00)In [3]: x / 0---------------------------------------------------------------------------ZeroDivisionError Traceback (most recent call last)<ipython-input-3-034eb0c6102b> in <module>----> 1 x/0ZeroDivisionError: division by zerotime: 88.7 ms (started: 2020-12-15 11:44:53 +01:00)```## Want to turn it off?```pythonIn [4]: %unload_ext autotime```
